thread.title: The Weeknd, One Direction to perform on Jingle Ball tour
thread.title_full: The Weeknd, One Direction to perform on Jingle Ball tour

title: The Weeknd, One Direction to perform on Jingle Ball tour
text: The Weeknd, One Direction to perform on Jingle Ball tour       FILE - In this Nov. 23, 2014 file photo, Selena Gomez performs on stage at the 42nd annual American Music Awards in Los Angeles. The Weeknd, One Direction and Selena Gomez are among the acts slated to perform on the 11-date Jingle Ball tour this December. IHeartRadio announced Monday, Oct. 5, that the tour will kick off Dec. 1 in Dallas.The Dec. 11 show at New York ™s Madison Square Garden will stream on Yahoo! and air as a 90-minute special on the CW Network on Dec. 17. (Photo by Matt Sayles/Invision/AP, File) FILE - In this Sept. 22, 2015 file photo, British band One Direction members, from left, Harry Styles, Liam Payne, Niall Horan, and Louis Tomlinson, perform on stage as part of the apple iTunes Festival 2015 in London. The Weeknd, One Direction and Selena Gomez are among the acts slated to perform on the 11-date Jingle Ball tour this December. IHeartRadio announced Monday, Oct. 5, that the tour will kick off Dec. 1 in Dallas.The Dec. 11 show at New York ™s Madison Square Garden will stream on Yahoo! and air as a 90-minute special on the CW Network on Dec. 17. (Photo by Joel Ryan/Invision/AP, File) FILE - In this June 28, 2015 file photo, The Weeknd performs at the BET Awards in Los Angeles. The Weeknd, One Direction and Selena Gomez are among the acts slated to perform on the 11-date Jingle Ball tour this December. IHeartRadio announced Monday, Oct. 5, that the tour will kick off Dec. 1 in Dallas.The Dec. 11 show at New York ™s Madison Square Garden will stream on Yahoo! and air as a 90-minute special on the CW Network on Dec. 17.
